[Joseph] [Tricker]

  1. Foster Name: Joseph
  2. Foster Family: Godfrey and Pauline Frischholz
  3. Location of Family: Columbus, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Columbus, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  7. Date of Birth: 1907-05-06
  8. Date of Death: 1983-03-03, Omaha, NE
  9. Gender: male
  10. Spouse Name: Mildred Frischholz
  11. Notes: Obit says he was born in NE, but in 1920 census he has Tricker last name and is listed as a boarder.
  12. Source: Columbus Telegram, 22 December 1911; Columbus Telegram, 4 March 1983; 1920 United States Federal Census.
